Package net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter

Generic text filter interfaces and implementations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TextFilter Interface for text filters that can work on any taglets.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTextFilter Abstract base class for all text filters.
IdentityTextFilter Text filter that simply returns the input values.
LiteralTextFilter Text filter that is used for literal text output.
ParamTextFilter Message filter that substitutes parameters.
ParamTextFilter.DefaultParam Parameter that returns a default value if the parameter replacement value is empty.
ParamTextFilter.OptionalParam Parameter that returns an optional value if the replacement value is not empty.
ParamTextFilter.Param Parameter class that handles parameter replacement.
PreformattedTextFilter Text filter that is used for preformatted text output.
RegexParamTextFilter Regular expression filter with parameter expansion.
RegexTextFilter Text filter that uses a regular expression pattern and replacement pattern.
 

Package net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter Description

Generic text filter interfaces and implementations.

This package provides reusable text filters that come in handy both when implementing block as well as inline taglets.
